channel.title: Safe Zone {317} Not Delta

item.title: Safe Zone {317} Not Delta
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“Repeated Shock, post:1, topic:437951”]my sever is a 317 rickscape v5 an almost the whole game is wild there are certain spots that are safe zones im just wondering how can i make my own safe zone i know everyone say seach Nonwild i have nothing shows. but i did find this

public boolean inSafezone() { // by Pk4r Pk4r
if ((absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112))

return true;
else
return false;
}

but it has nothing to do with safe zone??? i did try to make my own but failed help plz :)[/quote]
try replacing all “nonWild” to “isSafezone”, maybe?

Read full topic
